hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT new omis.hearinganalysis.report.HearingAnalysisSummary( eligibility.hearingEligibilityDate, eligibility.reviewDate, analystName.lastName, analystName.middleName, analystName.firstName, title.name) FROM omis.hearinganalysis.domain.HearingAnalysis hearingAnalysis INNER JOIN hearingAnalysis.eligibility eligibility LEFT JOIN hearingAnalysis.analyst boardMember LEFT JOIN boardMember.staffAssignment staffAssignment LEFT JOIN staffAssignment.staffMember staffMember LEFT JOIN staffMember.name analystName LEFT JOIN staffAssignment.title title WHERE hearingAnalysis = :hearingAnalysis
